dialogue.speaker: Narrator
dialogue.line: The world reforms, but the locket in your hand is now ice-cold. A beautiful memory, twisted into a weapon. How wonderfully pragmatic.

dialogue.speaker: Narrator
dialogue.line: You have proven you will do whatever it takes to fulfill your purpose. A valuable, if distasteful, quality.

dialogue.speaker: Narrator
dialogue.line: But such actions have consequences. The story is saved, but its foundations are now built on a corrupted truth. Things may not grow straight in this new world.

choices.text: I did what I had to do.

dialogue.line: The memory in the locket is now a silent scream. It is a reminder that even the purest things can be used for dark purposes.
